title: Mars Landing Video
alt: The best part of crashing a Mars briefing is you can get in a full 11 minutes of questions before they can start to respond.
transcript:
[Hairbun is standing on a circular stage in front of a lectern. There is a "Crash" on the top right of the panel, with a voice coming from there.]
Hairbun: We're excited to share the first ever full-speed video of a Mars landing.Off-screen character: Crash
Off-screen character: Doesn't that mean it's also the worst ever full-speed video of a mars landing?
Off-screen character: Do you expect that record to stand forever, or is NASA working on a worse one?[Caption below the comic]:
NASA tried to ban me from their press briefings, but ironically their security was totally unprepared to deal with a skycrane.
